Philibert RAZAFIMAHEFA.profile: STEM Educator and Computer Science graduate with strong experience integrating robotics, AI, and digital tools into interactive learning environments. English Club Moderator and STEM Club Leader with proven ability to facilitate dynamic, student-centered sessions for middle school, high school, and university learners. Passionate about transforming traditional lecture-based teaching into engaging, project-based, and technology-driven English learning experiences. Specialized in integrating robotics and computing vocabulary into practical, hands-on activities that foster confidence, collaboration, and critical thinking.

bullets: Led weekly robotics and coding workshops for 20+ students
Integrated English vocabulary into robotics and programming activities
Organized science fairs and project presentations
